title: Tre Valli Varesine Canceled After Pogačar and Peloton Protest Pounding Rain: ‘We Couldn’t See’
content:
'The manhole covers even came loose': Italian classic canceled after peloton comes to a halt after 58km of racing through torrential downpours.

Read the full article at Tre Valli Varesine Canceled After Pogačar and Peloton Protest Pounding Rain: ‘We Couldn’t See’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
